globalHeaders.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; connect-src 'self' https://*.azurewebsites.net wss://*.azurewebsites.net https://*.googleapis.com https://*.firebaseio.com https://*.firebaseapp.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://apis.google.com https://accounts.google.com; frame-src https://accounts.google.com https://*.firebaseapp.com
